General.Name: Kuen Chaang Uppertech
General.Description: Kuen Chaang Uppertech Corp. engages in the electronic component channel business in Taiwan. It is also involved in the modular and supply chain related products; and semiconductor business. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 92, BaoZhong Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
